channel.title: Our Right to Choose
channel.googleplay:author: Alex Sirek, The Oracle
channel.author: Alex Sirek, The Oracle
channel.itunes:author: Alex Sirek, The Oracle
channel.description: What does Minnesotan abortion access look like in our post-Roe v. Wade world? Our Right to Choose hosts monthly conversations between Alex Sirek–-an activist, journalist, and clinic escort, and a variety of guests to discuss all aspects of Minnesota’s abortion landscape! In the upper-midwest’s only remaining abortion sanctuary, it is more important than ever to assure that abortion access becomes even more equitable and intersectional.

item.author: Alex Sirek, The Oracle
item.itunes:author: Alex Sirek, The Oracle
item.title: Introducing: Our Right to Choose
item.description: More information about Our Right to Choose can be found at https://hamlineoracle.com/10686/uncategorized/after-deadline-our-right-to-choose/.
